Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ مَنْ شَاوَرْتَ ذُو التَّجَارِبِ وَشَرُّ مَنْ قَارَنْتَ ذُو الْمَعَايِبِ
enWisdom: The best person whom you can consult is the one with [abundant] experience and the worst person whom you can associate with is the one with [numerous] faults

Wisdom: خَيْرُ مَنْ شَاوَرْتَ ذَوُو النُّهَى وَالْعِلْمِ وَأُولُو التَّجَارِبِ وَالْحَزْمِ
enWisdom: The best among those whom you consult are the people of wisdom and knowledge, and those who possess experience and judiciousness

Wisdom: شَاوِرْ فِي أُمُورِكَ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ اللَّهَ تَرْشُدْ
enWisdom: Consult in your affairs those who fear Allah and you will be rightly guided

Wisdom: شَاوِرْ ذَوِي الْعُقُولِ تَأْمَنِ الزَّلَلَ وَالنَّدَمَ
enWisdom: Consult the intelligent ones and you will be safe from error and regret
One who consults an intelligent person acquires [his objective]

Wisdom: مَنْ شَاوَرَ ذَوِي الْعُقُولِ اسْتَضَاءَ بِأَنْوَارِ الْعُقُولِ
enWisdom: One who consults the people of intellect is enlightened by the lights of the intellects

Wisdom: مَنْ شَاوَرَ ذَوِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ فَازَ بِالنُّجْحِ وَالصَّوَابِ
enWisdom: One who consults the people of intellect and wisdom attains success and rightness

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَشَارَ ذَوِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ فَازَ بِالْحَزْمِ وَالسَّدَادِ
enWisdom: One who consults the people of intellect and wisdom, gains success through prudence and aptness?

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِذَوِي الْأَلْبَابِ سَلَكَ سَبِيلَ الرَّشَادِ
enWisdom: One who seeks assistance from the people of intellect traverses the path of right guidance
Consulting the judicious person who is concerned for you is a [means of attaining] triumph
